title: 死亡不掉落开启了，**时装会掉落
author: lihuqiao
txt_content: 服务器开启了死亡不掉落，穿在身上的时装**就会掉落，拿在手上不会掉落

replies.author: хmdhs
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Dirito
replies.txt_content:
在服务端的config/armourers_workshop/common.cfg中可以找到如下内容。
逐一修改
 # Should skins be dropped on player death.
    # 0 = use keep inventory rule
    # 1 = never drop
    # 2 = always drop
    I:dropSkinsOnDeath=1|
